definitions.title: f. dark
definitions.body: cloud, cloud-mass, thicket;—´[[ע]] abs. 1Ki 18:44 +, cstr. Is 18:4, Pr 16:15; pl. [[עָבִים]] Ju Jdg 5:4 + , [[עָבוֹת]] 2Sa 23:4, Psalm Ps 77:18; cstr. [[עָבֵי]] 2Sa 22:12, Ps 18:12; sf. [[עָבָיו]] Ps 18:13 (but prob. del., v. [[עבר]]

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: chariot of ´[[י]] Is 19:1, Ps 104:3; covering his eyes Job 22:14.

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: as swift Is 60:8, and transient Is 44:22, Job 30:15 (all sim.).
(cloud-) mass, [[שְׁחָקִים]] ´[[ע]] 2Sa 22:12 masses of clouds (enwrapping ´[[י]]) = Ps 18:12 (v:Ps 18:13 v. supr.).
thicket as refuge Je 4:29 (perh. under Aram. influence).—[[עַב]] Ex 19:9 v. [[עֲבִי]] sub [[עבה]]. I. [[עָב]] v. p. 713 supr.
